Name: Patriots: Back to Civilization
About the game: Peter is a Pig and he is leaving his wilderness, he is tired and ready to move to new lands. Collecting their belongings and the rest of the rubles, on the way they will throw sticks in the wheels, and the uneven roads and endless barriers of their native lands will become a real test in overcoming new horizons. Patriots: Back to Civilization - Side Scroller tractor control game in physical space, where any tilt and speed can flip your tractor and end the game. Dodging sticks flying by, jumping over gates and other obstacles, you need to keep your balance and drive forward. Features of the game: - Physical World - Beautiful Pixel-Art - Complexity
